snippet: North Korea’s state-run television called its young untested leader, Kim Jong-un, a “military genius” and showed him inspecting military hardware.
abstract: North Korea's state-run television, in what appears to be part of the government's frenzied campaign to burnish the credentials of its young leader Kim Jong-un, broadcasts a documentary praising him as a 'military genius' who will be a great successor to his father Kim Jong-il.
lead_paragraph: North Korea’s state-run television called its young untested leader, Kim Jong-un, a “military genius” and showed him inspecting military hardware.

headline.seo: North Korea Tries to Build the Image of Kim Jong-un With Documentary
headline.main: North Korea Tries to Build New Leader’s Image
headline.print_headline: Leader Is Young, but Rest Assured, He’s a ‘Genius’
